title: Ticket #3458: APPEND_REQUIREMENTS should not apply to scheduler universe?
description:
Just dealt with an email on htcondor-users from a user whose DAGs got goofed up by having APPEND_REQUIREMENTS set in their configuration -- that caused the schedd to report "The Requirements attribute for job 7918.0 did not evaluate. Unable to start job".

Would we ever have a case where APPEND_REQUIREMENTS should apply to the scheduler universe? I don't think so.
creator: wenger
